admin/editor.gift-image.title: Gift Image
admin/editor.gift-image.imageLabel.title: Image label
admin/editor.gift-image.imageLabel.descr: Label to specify which image from the product should be displayed.
admin/editor.gift-name.title: Gift Name
admin/editor.gift-name.linkToProduct.des: Whether or not the gift-name should also be a link to the product page.
admin/editor.product-gifts.title: Product Gifts
admin/editor.product-gifts.description: Display available gifts for the current product.
admin/editor.product-gifts.maxVisibleIte: Maximum number of gifts that should be rendered at once. (use "showAll" to always show all available gifts)
admin/editor.product-gift-text.title: Product Gifts Text
admin/editor.product-gift-text.text.desc: A translatable string that has variables that might be used to render any text regarding the gifts. Its format uses UCI rules and the available variables are: totalGifts, exceedingItems and visibleItems.
